commits.author: James Ko
commits.summary: Add `noexcept` to the list of storage modifiers

commits.author: Alexander Regueiro
commits.summary: Fixed typo preventing TM_CLANG_FORMAT_STYLE var from being read

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Fix exception when using header completion for untitled documents
commits.body: This only affected user headers since here we search current folder but was checking that current folder wasn’t nil rather than the empty string.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add syntax highlight for CoreGraphics types
commits.body: This includes the fairly ubiquitous CGFloat.

commits.author: Vicent Marti
commits.body:
The `{,N}` extension is not supported by most Regexp engines, as it is
an Onigurma-only extension.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Don't require whitespace after include directive
commits.body: Whitespace is not required to be present for compilation, fixes #23.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Don’t scope <kbd class='tabTrigger'>for⇥</kbd> loop to Objective-C(++)
commits.body: There is an NSUInteger-based for loop snippet in the Objective-C bundle.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Move symbols from /usr/include to its own Platform grammar file
commits.body: This makes it easier to automatically update the grammar.

commits.author: Andy Herbert
commits.summary: Enable enumeration snippet in C/Obj-C files (<kbd class='tabTrigger'>enum⇥</kbd>)

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body: Also add actual “storage” keyword to the scope name (both these and a few others).

commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.body:
This makes 'file' style to work, as clang-format needs to know file path to
resolve possible .clang-format style definition files placement.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Improve filename → identifier conversion in snippets
commits.body: Also use document’s display name (relevant for untitled documents).
